Ancestry-Leshy -- Male Vine Leshy Fighter
Strength: +1 Dexterity: +3 Constitution: +2 Intelligence: +0 Wisdom: +2 Charisma: +1
Background: Acolyte Deity: Gozreh
Experience: 482/1000 Level: 1 Speed: 15 Size: Small Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 6/11
Attribute Notes:
Armor Speed Penalty: -5 Speed
Attribute Boosts: Attribute Boost (Choose 4 from any)
Seaweed Leshy: -5 Speed
Leshy Glide: (1) Glides downward, moving 5' down and up to 25' forward each rd
Lotus Leshy: Can walk at 7' Speed across still liquids and Balance to move across flowing water
Seaweed Leshy: Has a 20' swim Speed and can breathe water
Features/Skills
Feat Count: Ancestry; Class Selectable Feature Count: Fighter (Key Attribute); Leshy (Heritage)
Feats: Anchoring Roots; Bark And Tendril; Call Of The Green Man; Cloak Of Poison; Exacting Strike; Flourish And Ruin; Grasping Reach; Harmlessly Cute; Leshy Glide; Leshy Lore; Leshy Superstition; Lucky Keepsake; Regrowth; Ritual Reversion; Seedpod; Shadow Of The Wilds; Solar Rejuvenation; Speak With Kindred; Thorned Seedpod; Undaunted Fighter Features: Attack Expert (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons; Unarmed Attacks); Attack Trained (Advanced Weapons); Attribute Boost (Dexterity); Attribute Boosts; Class Trained (Fighter); Defense Trained (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Heavy Armor; Unarmored Defense); Dexterity; Fighter Feats; Fighter Key Attribute; Fighter Skills; Perception Expert; Reactive Strike; Save Expert (Fortitude; Reflex); Save Trained (Will); Shield Block Acolyte Features: Attribute Boost (Choose 1 from Intelligence, Wisdom; Choose 1 from any); Skill Trained (Religion; Scribing Lore); Student Of The Canon Leshy Features: Ancestry Feats; Attribute Boost (Constitution; Wisdom; Choose 1 from any); Attribute Flaw (Intelligence); Cactus Leshy; Fruit Leshy; Fungus Leshy; Gourd Leshy; Leaf Leshy; Leshy Heritage; Lotus Leshy; Low-Light Vision; Plant Nourishment; Root Leshy; Seaweed Leshy; Small; Vine Leshy
Feature Notes:
Ancestry Feats: Ancestry Feats (Choose 1 from any)
Anchoring Roots: Has the Anchor and Steady Balance features
Fighter Feats: Class Feats (Choose 1 from any)
Fighter Key Attribute: 1 selection
Fungus Leshy: Has the Darkvision feature
Harmlessly Cute: Has the Shameless Request feature
Leshy Heritage: 1 selection
Leshy Lore: Has the Additional Lore (Leshy Lore) feature
Darkvision: Has normal b/w vision in darkness and dim light
Fungus Leshy: Has the fungus trait, not the plant trait
Gourd Leshy: Can store 1 Bulk of objects within head
Low-Light Vision: Has normal vision in dim light
Plant Nourishment: Gains nourishment from nature
Root Leshy: Can go 2 weeks without sunlight before starving
Perception: +7 (wisdom; expert)
Skill Modifiers:
Absalom Lore: +3 (intelligence; trained) Deception: +1 (charisma; untrained) Performance: +1 (charisma; untrained)
Acrobatics: +1 (dexterity; untrained) Diplomacy: +1 (charisma; untrained) Religion: +5 (wisdom; trained)
Arcana: +0 (intelligence; untrained) Intimidation: +1 (charisma; untrained) Scribing Lore: +3 (intelligence; trained)
Architecture Lore: +3 (intelligence; trained) Leshy Lore: +3 (intelligence; trained) Society: +0 (intelligence; untrained)
Athletics: +2 (strength; trained) Medicine: +2 (wisdom; untrained) Stealth: +4 (dexterity; trained)
Cavern Lore: +3 (intelligence; trained) Nature: +5 (wisdom; trained) Survival: +2 (wisdom; untrained)
Crafting: +0 (intelligence; untrained) Occultism: +0 (intelligence; untrained) Thievery: +1 (dexterity; untrained)
Languages: Common; Fey
Skill Notes:
Additional Lore (Leshy Lore): Skill Trained (Leshy Lore)
Armor Skill Penalty: -2 strength and dexterity skills
Fighter Skills: Skill Trained (Choose 1 from Acrobatics, Athletics; Choose 3 from any)
Leshy Lore: Skill Trained (Nature; Stealth)
Harmlessly Cute: +1 initiative when using Deception
Shadow Of The Wilds: Has continuous Covering Tracks effects outside of urban environments
Shameless Request: Reduces the DC for an outrageous request by 2 and changes critical failures into normal failures
Speak With Kindred: Can speak with plants and fungi and gains +2 Diplomacy with plants or fungi similar to self
Steady Balance: Balance successes are critical successes/Balance does not inflict off-balance/Can use Acrobatics to Grab An Edge
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
Vine Leshy: Can Climb with both hands occupied, and successes to Climb are critical successes
Combat
Hit Points: 22 Armor Class: 18 (dexterity (1 max); trained) Class DC: Fighter: 16 (dexterity; trained)
Armor: Breastplate Shield: Tower (+2 AC when raised; hardness 5; HP 20) Weapons: Light Pick (+6 1d4+1 P [Crit d8]; strength; expert); Longspear (+6 1d8+1 P; strength; expert); Shield Boss (+6 1d6+1 B; strength; expert); Spines (+8 1d6+1 P; dexterity; expert)
Combat Notes:
Cactus Leshy: Spines unarmed attack inflicts 1d6 HP piercing
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +3
Root Leshy: +2 Hit Points
Strength Attack Adjustment: +1
Cloak Of Poison: (2) Successful foe unarmed and non-reach melee attacks inflict 3d6 HP poison on the attacker for 1 min once per day
Exacting Strike: (1) Strike does not count toward the multiple attack penalty on failure
Grasping Reach: Can reach 10' with two-handed weapons that inflict at least 1d6 HP; doing so reduces the damage die by 1 step
Reactive Strike: (R) Makes a melee Strike on a foe within reach that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Seedpod: R30' Seedpod attack inflicts 1d4 HP bludgeoning, plus -10' Speed until the start of the next turn on a critical success
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Solar Rejuvenation: Regains 0 HP from 10 min rest in a suitable environment
Thorned Seedpod: Critical hits with seedpods inflict 1d4 HP persistent piercing
Save: Fortitude: +7 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +8 (dexterity; expert); Will: +5 (wisdom; trained)
Save Notes:
Anchor: (1) Gives +4 vs. Reposition, Shove, Trip, magical move, and magical knock prone and reduces the distance on a successful attempt by half; taking a move action ends
Leaf Leshy: Takes no damage from falling
Leshy Superstition: (R) +1 on the triggering save vs. a spell or magical effect
Lucky Keepsake: +1 vs. spells and magical effects
Root Leshy: +2 vs. attempts to Reposition, Shove, or Trip and spells and effects that move or knock prone
Undaunted: +1 vs. emotion effects, and successes vs. emotion are critical successes
Magic
Attack: Primal Innate: +4 (charisma; trained) Spell DC: Primal Innate: 14 (charisma; trained)
Spells:
Entangling Flora (P2): (2) R120' 20' burst inflicts difficult terrain and -10' Speed for 1 min (save Reflex inflicts difficult terrain only; critical failure inflicts immobilized for 1 rd)
Field Of Life (P6): (2) R30' 20' burst restores 1d8 HP per rd to living and inflicts 1d8 HP vitality per rd to undead while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened 8th restores and inflicts 1d10 HP; 9th restores and inflicts 1d12 HP)
Oaken Resilience (P2): (2) Touched gains resistance 2 to bludgeoning and piercing and weakness 3 to fire for 10 min or until dismissed by target (heightened +2 gives +2 resistances and +3 weakness)
Plant Form (P5): (2) Self becomes a Large plant with 12 temporary HP, Armor Class 20, +17 attack, +11 damage, low-light vision, resistance 10 to poison, +19 Athletics modifier, and plant-specific attacks for 1 min (heightened 6th becomes a Huge plant with +5' reach, 24 temporary HP, Armor Class 23, +21 attack, +16 damage, +22 Athletics)
Regenerate (P7): (2) Touched target regains 15 HP and regrows a damaged organ each rd for 1 min; suffering new acid or fire damage negates the effects for 1 rd (heightened 9th restores 20 HP each rd)
Tangling Creepers (P6): (3) R500' 40' burst inflicts -10' Speed, and a successful unarmed attack immobilizes 1 target for 1 rd (a successful Escape negates), each rd for 10 min
Magic Notes:
Bark And Tendril: Knows the Entangling Flora and Oaken Resilience primal innate spells; can cast each at 2nd rank once per day
Call Of The Green Man: Knows the Plant Form primal innate spell; can cast it at 5th rank once per day
Flourish And Ruin: Knows the Field Of Life and Tangling Creepers primal innate spells; can cast each at 6th rank once per day
Regrowth: Knows the Regenerate primal innate spell; can cast it at 7th rank once per day
Fruit Leshy: Produces a fruit each day that restores 1d8 Hit Points if eaten within an hr after removal
Ritual Reversion: (2) Transforms self into a normal plant with AC 20 for 8 hr
Notes
Validation Errors:
Ancestry Feats Allocation: 1 available vs. 19 allocated
Anchoring Roots Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 5
Bark And Tendril Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 9
Call Of The Green Man Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 13
Cloak Of Poison Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 13
Flourish And Ruin Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 17
Leshy Glide Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 5 and leaf leshy feature (currently 1) or cat fall feature
Leshy Heritage Allocation: 1 available vs. 9 allocated
Lucky Keepsake Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 9 and leshy superstition feature (currently 1)
Regrowth Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 17
Ritual Reversion Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 5
Solar Rejuvenation Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 9
Speak With Kindred Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 5
Thorned Seedpod Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 9 and seedpod feature (currently 1)
